name: On This Last Night
description:
You were playing your favorite game, but you receive a letter from a friend, It also had a tape of a game called Paint Plush, Without many forms of entertainment you start playing the game,But you can't stop playing anymore, You feel like there's something in that game that needs you, And you need to know what it wants.

Painted Plush O'What is it? A Plush? An entity? Or something made for evil?

---Team---

Art-Chris Smoker

Programmer-Mikael Preci

Theme-Sir Tanaka

By Mangle Games Team
